Package Domain

Class Huffman

  • java.lang.Object
    • Domain.Algorithm
      • Domain.Huffman
  • public class Huffman
extends Algorithm
    Huffman encoder, compress an InputStream to an OutputStream and decompress a valid InputStream to an OutputStream

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxSizeHint

        public void setMaxSizeHint​(int maxSizeInBytes)
        sets the max size in bytes of the inputstream so the header can be optimized
        Parameters:
        maxSizeInBytes - maximum size in bytes of the input stream (use 2^31-1 if unknown or default), this value its needed for decompress

      • compress

        public void compress​(java.io.InputStream is,
                     java.io.OutputStream os)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Compresses the input stream into the output stream given the max size of the input stream.
        Specified by:
        compress in class Algorithm
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream with an amount of data between 0 and maxSizeInBytes
        os - OutputStream will be written with the compressed InputStream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If reading/writting to the input and output streams fails

      • decompress

        public void decompress​(java.io.InputStream is,
                       java.io.OutputStream os)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Decompresses the input stream into the output stream given the max size of the input stream.
        Specified by:
        decompress in class Algorithm
        Parameters:
        is - InputStream with an amount of data between 0 and maxSizeInBytes
        os - OutputStream will be written with the compressed InputStream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If reading/writting to the input and output streams fails

      • generateTrie

        private Huffman.Node generateTrie​(int[] freq)
        Creates the trie used by the huffman encoding at compression time
        Parameters:
        freq - array of R size that contains the frequency of the codes with integer value of the index
        Returns:
        the root of the generated trie

      • generateCodeTable

        private void generateCodeTable​(ByteArray[] st,
                               Huffman.Node x,
                               ByteArray s)
        Generates a lookup table st from the codes and their encodings
        Parameters:
        st - Lookup table to fill (this function is recursive so it can be partially populated)
        x - Current node that isn't traversed for the current code (Node.code) yet
        s - ByteArray with the codified path or partial path for the current code (Node.code)

      • serializeTrie

        private void serializeTrie​(BitOutputStream bos,
                           Huffman.Node x)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the trie used by the huffman encoding to the output stream codified as bits
        Parameters:
        bos - BitOutputStream where trie with root x will be encoded and written
        x - Root node of the huffman encoding trie that will be written to the BitOutputStream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if writing to the BitOutputStream fails

      • deserializeTrie

        private Huffman.Node deserializeTrie​(BitInputStream bis)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Generates the huffman encoding trie from the BitInputStream
        Parameters:
        bis - BitInputStream from where the codified tree will be read
        Returns:
        the root node for the generated huffman encoding tree
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if writting to the BitInputStream fails
